name: SeizureTracker
0:
”Alexa, tell Seizure Tracker to track a seizure.”
”Alexa, ask Seizure Tracker when was the last seizure?”
”Alexa, tell Seizure Tracker to track a rescue medication.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: seizure tracker
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill requires account linking with SeizureTracker.com. Use your existing Seizure Tracker account or create a new one through the skill linking process. 
This skill will allow you to record the beginning of a seizure event...
"Alexa, tell Seizure Tracker to track a seizure."
You can record the length of that seizure by saying...
"Alexa, tell Seizure Tracker the seizure is over."
Event details can be edited through SeizureTracker.com or on any of the mobile device apps.
To get a recorded seizure count for the day say...
"Alexa, tell Seizure Tracker to count the seizures."
Please feel free to contact us with questions or feature suggestions at Alexa@SeizureTracker.com.

Disclaimer: This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
